content.rendered:
What is Interiors E-design?

Interiors E-design is a remote service offered to create a custom design, without retaining full Interiors services and without requiring on-site presence of a designer. All communication is established via calls, on-line meetings and e-mails. A process is set up to create a custom design that meets client style, space and budget.

Interiors E-design is ideal for room makeover (bedroom, children’s room, living room, dining room, office), renovation (kitchen, bathroom) and color palette (apartment, house, office).

How does it work?

We arrange a 1 hour call, free of charge and with no obligation, to discuss your project. Following this call, you will receive a quote detailing the Interiors E-design process and package. If you decide to go further with our collaboration, the Interiors E-design process will take place as follows:

  1. You complete the design questionnaire to establish requirements and budget. Send any images and links you find insightful.
  2. You provide photos and measurements of the room. Include photos and measurements of items you wish to keep.
  3. 20% prepayment of the quote is required, to launch the work on the Interiors E-design package.
  4. Elaboration of the Interiors E-design package typically lasts from 2 to 3 weeks. Please note that 1 round of revisions is included in the package.
  5. 80% final payment after delivery.

How much does it cost?

Fees start at 500 € or 3700 dkk per room. Please get in touch for custom quotes.

What does it include?

The Interiors E-design package includes:

  • Mood board showing the inspiration vibe and including colors, materials and textures.
  • Floor plan to scale including both existing and new items.
  • Interior elevation to scale detailing window treatment and wall decor.
  • Vision board and color palette illustrating the look and feel of the room.
  • Shopping list with links to recommended items and design notes.
